channel.title: Error connecting
channel.description: Everytime i try a server or make my own it allways comes up as "Error connecting to server, server must be down ETC" i put in the right port and IP and it never works. why is this?

item.title: Error connecting
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:3, topic:153805”][quote author=owner Ethan link=topic=210174.msg1841232#msg1841232 date=1193225930]
Because its down “SERVER MUST BE DOWN”
[/quote]

Shutup idiot.

presto owned: for the IP, put in 0.0.0.0[/quote]your the idiot, im just saying its down
If your trying to get on the Hybridscape one put in ip as 0.0.0.0 127.0.0.2, 127.0.0.1
or leave blank, maybe even “localhost”
before that, Click Start server then ok, type the password and username in
(AND PORT :X)

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting

Because its down “SERVER MUST BE DOWN”
[/quote]

Shutup idiot.

presto owned: for the IP, put in 0.0.0.0[/quote]
Or 127.0.0.1
ANDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD don’t forget the port.

THE END.
